title: Blank Cake
description: Misti Rainwater-Lites dances the coals to pretty embers in her clearance sidewalk sale flip flops. She's got a load of self-published chapbooks for sale on-line (google her) and she has chapbooks available from Kendra Steiner Editions, Deadbeat Press, Erbacce Press, and Scintillating Publications. Too...Misti is a mom, a wife, a photographer, a freelance geek and an aspiring lounge singer/championship bowler/soft-core porn star in Fred Olen Ray flicks.
author: Misti Rainwater-Lites
